jobs.description: Development of various websites for the company's clients. SEO/SEM analysis and optimization of web page loading speed.

schools.description: Learning to develop web applications with React, from setting up the development environment to deploying applications in production.

schools.position: University Expert in Web Application Development

project.title: Extension Manager
project.description: Extension Manager is a web application that allows users to manage browser extensions. Users can enable, disable, and delete extensions, as well as filter extensions by status (active, inactive, or all).
project.tech: React | TailwindCSS | Responsive | React Hooks | Filters

project.title: Airbnb Clone
project.description: Clone of the Airbnb website with filtering functionalities. I have integrated a small Backend deployed on Render. The database is hosted on MongoDB Atlas
project.tech: React | Nodejs | Mongodb Atlas | Render | Tailwind CSS | Filters

project.title: Harry Potter App
project.description: Web application that displays information about Harry Potter characters. It uses the Harry Potter API to fetch data and display it in the app. Search and filter functionalities.
project.tech: React | CSS | API Rest | React Hooks | Filters

project.title: Daroma Innovations
project.description: Company website developed for Daroma Innovations. The website is designed to showcase the company's services and portfolio.
project.tech: React | UX/UI  | Framer Motion | CSS Animations
